Description of incident: Forbes.com announced on their Facebook page February 14th, that they had been a target of a data breach by hackers. They claim that "the email address for anyone registered with Forbes.com has been exposed  Please be wary of emails that purport to come from Forbes, as the list  of email addresses may be used in phishing attacks.  The  passwords were encrypted, but as a precaution, we will strongly  encourage Forbes.com readers to change their passwords on our system  once we make sign-on available again".
